General.Name: Actoz Soft Co.Ltd
General.Description: Actoz Soft Co.,Ltd. operates as a game company in South Korea and internationally. The company develops and services PC online games and mobile games of various genres. It is also involved in esports industry; and operation of professional game team. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. Actoz Soft Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanda Games Limited.
General.Address: ICON Yeoksam Building, Seoul, South Korea, 06210
